alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:36PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Oldham and southwestern Hartley Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 636 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Romero, or 6 miles northeast of Nara Visa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Romero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
